title: League of fusions
body:
gonna start fusing various league champions and posting them, more comming soon!
akalarina is akali and katarina fused, to create the top skilled assassin in runeterra.

replies.body: How about  a harder one? Jinkko or Rivsuo
how about a Shyvana and Elise fusion?
Sounds like a plan to me {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
